name: Mr. Button (Jam Version)
description:
My entry for One Button Jam 2016

Mr. Button is a short interactive story based game that aims to take the player on a journey of mixed emotions. It is mainly text based but there are a few minigame type puzzles and reactionary scenes that serve to heighten the mood.

Unfortunately I didn't get to finish the game. At All. I only managed to work on it the last few days and only for a few hours so it was nowhere near what I wanted, even the current 'Acts' are not fully realized but hopefully I'll find some time to continue working on it.

Tip: You know it is the end when it hits the credits, it does not get stuck in a loop in a certain scene, it's made to make you think ;)

Please leave a rating or comment if you would like to see more, any support would be greatly appreciated.

Please Play With The Sound ON, otherwise you'll miss out on some amazing music by Kevin MacLeod. Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License.

Controls = Left Mouse Button
